lyrics:
Well let's burn until the sun burns your eye
And keep burnin' till it sets on the Westside
Just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Devious:
It's late night where the sun rest
Flick your Bics let's get lit man
I'm dressin' up this trick
Ms. Philly she got big plans
With a few bags of do bad
She the bomb when you hit it
'Cause you glad to get blasted like Manson
Knowin' Mr. Dutchmaster burn faster
But Big Daddy done turned into a bastard
So I'm no kin to Father Time when I'm smokin'
Who said trees couldn't grow dollar signs
No bought it by the lines
Till tomorrow shine coast to coast
Blow the smoke go for broke
Get yours split yours
And keep sippin' fifths till ya pis poor
And if ya can't handle this
Still could hit the floor
It's strictly herb in the chest cavity
So we high to defy all the laws of gravity
Rapidly when I come down like avalanches
I look the streets in search for free weed advances

Well let's burn until the sun burns your eyes
And keep burnin' till it sets on the Westside
Just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Now burn until the sun burns your eye
And keep burnin' till it sets on the Westside
Just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Diz:
Swisher Sweets Phillie Blunts Dutchmasters
Vega Papers man they keep me blasted
And I blast one or two for my revenue if I have to
For now it's top bangin' strictly smokin' and drankin'
And mighty thought thinkin'
And paper chasin' Ben Franklins
Lizards on my twos with G-Strings and nipple rings
Cigarrellas split open rollin' icky sticky lime green
High mean of high ?? to raise the limit to keep
Burnin' Spinach till the moonlight diminish
Still blazin' one nigga who ain't never too faded
Let me explain it the rage man
They babble it's street babble
Smoke herb and rearrange words together like Scrabble
Grab yo' E & J yo' Hennessay yo' Presidentay
A zip of bombay and all y'all come with me
And just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Now burn until the sun burns your eyes
And keep burnin' till it sets on the Westside
Just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Now burn until the sun burns your eye
And keep burnin' till it sets on the Westside
Just ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Let's ride and stay high all night
Let's just ride and stay high all night

Devious:
We keep it lit y'all
But don't you get crossed up like ya bitch bra
If y'all switch and get crossed
And the senses gettin' quick to split y'all
And make y'all collapse flat
Like Hank Gathers at the free throw
No dis but when the weed grows
We roll the whole lawn
And blow till the break of dawn
So it's all beneficial
An Ill Mind with a twisted thought
It's official
Diz
You're cordially invited to a all-nighter
OG's be ?'in on seeds E & J & apple cider
Turn the lights down and get yo' lighters up
Pour up a cup and get fucked up

We's 'bout to ride and stay high all night
Just ride and stay high all night
We just ridin' stayin' high all night
Just ridin' stayin high all night
Blazin',
Swisher Sweets Phillie Blunts Dutchmasters
Them Vega Papers man they keep me blasted
Just ridin' stayin' high all night
Just ridin' stayin' high all night
So grab yo E & J yo' Hennessay yo' Presidentay
A zip of bombay and all y'all come with me
We ridin' stayin' high all night
Just ridin' stayin' high all night
Just ridin' stayin' high all night
Stayin' high all night
Stayin' high all night
